column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|
|Ethernet Demarcation device|H18EDD-0402P|提供高性能 L2 交换服务，具备维护和部署的便利性、多业务支持、运营商级 OAM 管理、可靠的保护机制、QoS 策略、安全机制等服务优化措施，同时具有出色的可扩展性和可靠性。支持 E1、V.35 等业务接口，支持最新的运营商以太网属性，兼容 IEEE、ITU 和 MEF 标准。|

column2: Point to point mode(if port configured with ERPS, then STP is unavailable )
Port limited speed, port mirroring, priority trust, flow class, flow strategy, priority mapping, queue scheduling
Backpressure under half-duplex mode; IEEE802.3x under full-duplex mode
Actively judge faults for EVC, including CC (Continuity Check), LB (Loop Back) and LT (Link Trace).
Real time for network capacity statistics
Link Layer Discovery Protocol, NM can rapidly master second network topology and changes through it.
Access Control List, including IP ACL and MAC ACL
Auto-aggregation, 1000M full-duplex/ half-duplex, 100M full-duplex/ half-duplex, 10M full-duplex/half-duplex.
5, 4 UNI ports and 1 SNMP NM port
IEEE 802.3/IEEE 802.3z/ IEEE 802.3Q/ IEEE 802.1p/ IEEE 802.1ad/ IEEE 802.1d/ IEEE 802.1w/ IEEE 802.3ad/ IEEE 802.3ah/ IEEE 802.1ag/Y1731

column1: Point to point single route extra handling delay time
